headline: WINTER MENU, FIERY FLAVORS
body: Spiced mochas, mezcal cortados, and scratch-made breakfast tacos hit the line all season.

headline: COFFEE CART FOR EVENTS
body: From office drops to wedding weekends, our bar team will pull up with beans, steam, and smiles.

headline: LATTE LAB THURSDAYS
body: Limited-run drinks, guest roasters, and live vinyl from local DJs every Thursday night.
